As your sister rapidly expands, you panic and call for the magician. Pointing out your current situation, the magician only reacts by looking at Lisa and nodding his head.

"Unfortunately, I think I forgot to mention one of the power's drawbacks. Once you increase a person's size, the change is permanent. You can only make Lisa grow now, not shrink. Any future uses of the power on your sister will only increase her size. Now, her permanent height is 50ft. Do try to be careful."

The magician winks, and then disappears.

Pieces of wood, metal, and glass fall around you as Lisa continues to grow. She feet have burst through the floor and her head has punched open the roof. You yell as you fall through the collapsing floor. Suddenly, you are next to Lisa's feet as you try to avoid the falling debris. You make a last break for the door and dive out onto the lawn.

When you can finally bring yourself to look, you see your teenage sister Lisa casting a shadow over the block. At 50ft tall, she towers over the two-story houses that line your neighborhood. Her clothes appear over-stretched and tatterred, a wonder that the rags are even still clinging to her. Her pink Hello Kitty T-Shirt is almost completely torn to pieces. Her black shorts are stretched to the point that they now look like a thong. Though her figure is still rougly the same, that of an athletic teenage girl, at her size her body is awe-inspiring. You watch Lisa pull back her hair and attempt to brush the dust out of her eyes.

Your sister finally gets a chance to look at her surroundings and her eyes lock onto you.

"Wow, some power you have there bro. Sorry i doubted you." Lisa says. Her voice booms over the block.

You run over to her toe and ask if she feels alright.

"Well, a little worried about what mom will say when she gets back from the store. Other than that, I think I'm fine. Thanks for the growth. This is really kewl."

Lisa then bends down to one knee to get a look at the ruins of your house. To think, a week ago, she was playing with her doll house. She picks up a car on the roadside and looks it over before dropping it back on the ground.

On the street, the neighbors are staring up at your sister from the curb. They all try to keep their distance, not sure of what Lisa will do.

"I want to take a walk. Thanks again bro. Let me know if there is anything I can do to pay you back."

Before she rises back up, you grab her ankle to get Lisa's attention. If you made Lisa a giantess, the least you should get to do is ride into the city with her.

Lisa smiles and laughs. She places you onto her shoulder. "Just grab onto my hair"

She then stands to her full height and begins to walk. Each step shakes the earth underneath it.
